## Institutional Archives Powering The Connections Project

Collections organized by institution, with notes on network contributions.

### Howard University

-   <a href="https://msrc.howard.edu/" target="_blank">Moorland-Spingarn Research Center</a>\
    The Moorland-Spingarn Research Center (MSRC) is the largest and most comprehensive repository of books, documents, and ephemera on the global Black experience. Their mission is to provide access to history through diverse formats and to preserve it for generations to come.
-   <a href="https://dh.howard.edu/huarchives/" target="_blank">University Archives</a>\
    Various university records, including those made available by the MSRC.

### Catholic University of America

-   <a href="https://findingaids.lib.catholic.edu/repositories/2/resources/99" target="_blank">The Haynes-Lofton Family Papers</a>\
    Euphemia Haynes photos and archival records.

### Emory University
